substitution.copyText: Therefore I have entreated him along, | With us to watch the minutes of this night, | '' That if again this apparition come, | '' He may approve our eyes and speak to it
Bar. Sit down a while, | And let us once again assail your ears
substitution.amendedText: Bar. Come, | let us once again assail your ears

substitution.copyText: Well, let's down, | And let us hear Barnardo speak of this.
substitution.amendedText: Well, | let us hear Barnardo speak of this.

substitution.copyText: Bar. In the same figure, like the King that's dead. | Mar. Thou art a Scholar, speak to it Horatio.
substitution.amendedText: Ber: Looks it not like the king?
